solution_line_template: The total cost for food was {monthly_food_cost}*{months_per_year}=$<<{monthly_food_cost}*{months_per_year}={total_food_cost}>>{total_food_cost}
So Jenny spent {shared_expenses}/{split_divisor}=$<<{shared_expenses}/{split_divisor}={jenny_shared_expenses}>>{jenny_shared_expenses} on shared expenses
So the total cost she paid was {jenny_shared_expenses}+{toys_cost}=$<<{jenny_shared_expenses}+{toys_cost}={total_cost_jenny_paid}>>{total_cost_jenny_paid}
